subject: Alpine Skiing
Olympic Games (2010)
lead_paragraph: The nickname is sticking to the 23-year-old Carlo Janka of Switzerland as he coolly, smoothly takes advantage of his technique and phenomenal feel for the snow.
snippet: The nickname is sticking to the 23-year-old Carlo Janka of Switzerland as he coolly, smoothly takes advantage of his technique and phenomenal feel for the snow.
